summary: We testified on how DOD can better manage private military housing for servicemembers and their families, addressing our reports on: DOD's oversight and its role in managing privatized housing Shortcomings in how DOD determines basic housing allowances Poor oversight of property insurance and natural disaster recovery As of Feb. 2021, DOD has taken steps to improve oversight of its privatized housing program. For example, DOD...
title: Military Housing: DOD Has Taken Key Steps to Strengthen Oversight, but More Action Is Needed in Some Areas
